DOC.brief_summary: DelAgua Health Development , Manna Energy Rwanda Ministry Health collaborate project finance carbon credit distribute household-based water filter high-efficiency cook stove approximately 700,000 household Rwanda . Prior full roll campaign , implementers conduct pilot project among 2000 household western Rwanda . The objective pilot evaluation document delivery intervention intervention population , assess coverage uptake intervention target household conduct 5-month randomise control trial among 500 household assess impact intervention drinking water quality indoor air quality .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Project Distribute Water Filters Cookstoves Western Rwanda
